# Background Size

The following table outlines the support for various background size classes:

| Class              | Support     |
| ------------------ | ----------- |
| `bg-auto`          | 🌐 Web only |
| `bg-cover`         | 🌐 Web only |
| `bg-contain`       | 🌐 Web only |

These classes are used to control the sizing of background images in web development.
